plot: In Universal's series version of audience-singalong participation, Chito Izar sings "Negra Leono" - "I Want my Mama" - and "You Never Say Yes", while a chorus of unrehearsed chorus girls dances, and the Bouncing Ball bounces.
title: Let's Go Latin
plot_es: In Universal's series version of audience-singalong participation, Chito Izar sings "Negra Leono" - "I Want my Mama" - and "You Never Say Yes", while a chorus of unrehearsed chorus girls dances, and the Bouncing Ball bounces.
